name: Western Outlaw: Wanted Dead or Alive
name_original: Western Outlaw: Wanted Dead or Alive
description:
Western Outlaw: Wanted Dead or Alive is an action-shooter game developed by Jarhead Games. It came out on 29-09-2003. It was published by Groove Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Western Outlaw: Wanted Dead or Alive on PC.
